channel.title: PUT and request parameters :: Web Apps in Lisp: Know-how
channel.description: To access the body parameters of a PUT request, one must add :PUT to hunchentoot:*methods-for-post-parameters*, which defaults to only (:POST): (push :put hunchentoot:*methods-for-post-parameters*) This parameter: is a list of the request method types (as keywords) for which Hunchentoot will try to compute POST-PARAMETERS. No such setting is required with Lack and Ningle.
